title: Only ten pints
creator_credit: St John Ambulance Australia and British Petroleum
brief_description: The fear of blood can be easily dispelled and people can learn what to do in case of an amergency…in a First Aid Class. Clear diagrams and commentary show how lives may be saved when an accident causes any type of haemorrhage.
creator_credit_for_label: St John Ambulance Australia and British Petroleum
